text:
If we should pass your admission requirements I would be very
anxious to discuss future programming possibilities with you.
The sample tapes we*re sending have the openings and closings
written for WTIC, We will be glad to prepare the tapes for you without
them and dub in any opening and closing you suggest. My best to Mr.
Regnell. Hoping to hear from you soon.
Sincerely,
Edith Kerr
Editor, YALE REPORTS
EK/mew
end.
